images.title: ASML EUV 노광기
images.description: ASML의 EUV(극자외선) 노광기 외관. 세계에서 가장 비싸고 복잡한 단일 제조 장비 중 하나(대당 ~$2억, High-NA ~$4억)

spec.prompt: A photorealistic image of an ASML EUV (Extreme Ultraviolet) lithography scanner in a semiconductor cleanroom. The machine is massive, approximately the size of a bus, with clean white and blue industrial design. It features multiple large modules connected together, with cable management systems and precision optical components visible. The cleanroom has yellow lighting and raised floor. The image conveys the extreme scale and engineering complexity of this $200M+ machine that is essential for manufacturing the world's most advanced semiconductor chips. Professional industrial photography, wide-angle view.
